authors.author: Dissanayake Mudiyanselage Priyantha Udaya Kumara Ralapanawa

text: A 60-year -old female with diabetes mellitus and known allergy to bee venom was stung by a hornet on the right hand. Within 30 minutes she developed hypotension and wide spread T wave inversion in the 12 leads ECG that remained unchanged about 5 hours and reversed back to normal.
